channel.title: Contact on jrobb.org
channel.description: Recent content in Contact on jrobb.org

item.title: Old and out of date contact Info
item.description: ###Social Networking (in order of use): pump.io : jrobb@io.jrobb.org – my main pump pump.io : jrobb@microca.st – my backup pump, if something goes wrong with the first StatusNet/GNUsocial : jrobb@quitter.se twitter: @jrobbnc google+: +JonathanRobbinsNC twister : @jrobb – I don’t use this much ###IRC: jrobb on FreeNode (usually hanging in #pump.io and/or #pump.io-offtopic) – I’m rarely on IRC. WhatsApp: (my phone number) – As much as it bugs me that this isn’t free software, the end-to-end encryption is nice and the userbase is pretty large.
